description.title: Kimetsu no Yaiba
description.context: Tanjiro sets out to become a demon slayer to avenge his family and cure his sister.A family is attacked by demons and only two members survive

description.title: Kaiju No.8
description.context: Kafka Hibino, a man who, after ingesting a kaiju, gains the ability to turn into one and now must navigate using his power while trying to become part of an organization that eliminates kaiju

description.title: Frieren: Beyond Journey's End
description.context: Frieren, an elf mage who had once embarked on perilous adventures with her comrades to vanquish evil. The story takes place decades after their victory.
